title: The Black Masque, Part 01: Rumors
description: Lady Brezia Sanguisi, a renowned blood alchemist, is growing weary with the bedroom games of the nobility, and longs for a new challenge that stretches her definition of pain. But when rumors describe a serial killer who carefully tortures his victims--who may or may not be willing participants--Brezia finds herself caught in a far more dangerous game than she intended...
author: Diana Razif
